website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Basket Classic Citi showcases its new look with an upgrade to its leather upper design. With its soft leather upper and lightly padded footbed, the shoe gives the wearer the comfort they need. Buyers also have a variety of colorways that would suit their taste.
pros: Most reviewers said that they liked how comfortable the Puma Basket Classic Citi shoes are
The low profile rubber midsole with a ribbed toe bumper of the shoe gives additional protection for the foot
Most of the buyers said that the shoe has a great fit
Some buyers are appreciative about the style of the shoe
A few reviewers liked the colorways of the sneaker
Some are appreciative about the shoe’s budget-friendly price
The shoe is available in multiple colorways
cons: A few reviewers complained about the leather of the shoe which cracks and wrinkles easily
A buyer said that the shoe is a little stiff
One reviewer said that the toe box lacks depth and tends to push down on the toenail even though its length is fine

customer_reviews.title: GOOD LOOKING SNEAKER
customer_reviews.text: GOT THEM IN DARK BLUE . GOOD LOOKING SNEAKER ,COMFORTABLE . BUT i LITERALLY PUT ON ONE TIME AND JUST WENT TO A FAMILY FUNCTION . AND THE SIDES CRACKED ON BOTH SIDES . WHAT I MEAN CRACKED IS THE LEATHER CRACKED AS YOU WALK . I BASICALLY DROVE TO FAMILY HOUSE AND BY THE END OF THE DAY THEY LOOKED LIKE I WORE THEM FOR MONTHS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kicks
customer_reviews.text: These kicks look good, and the upper suede portion is of nice quality, a tight nap. They fit well, but a little narrow in the toe area, but not much. The biggest negative is the the sole, there is about 1/8 inch thickness. If you step on a object such as a small rock you will feel it. However the heel appears to have ample cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bryan

customer_reviews.title: These shoes hug my feet- amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes. I am a female and I find that these size 6 men's shoes, fit my 7.5 size in women's, perfectly. These shoes also have amazing cushioning all around your foot. I have now ordered a few more pairs in different colors. Get them! And you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Laura E. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Rivals the Cole Haan Grandpro Tennis in look and style
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my brother's birthday and he loved them! I purchased them because he likes my husbands Cole Haan Grandpro Tennis but I don't for the price. So I purchased these as they're a good substitute. My husband actually likes these more than the Cole Haans...go figure. Really stylish with jeans, khakis or shorts.
customer_reviews.author: WamQQk

customer_reviews.title: Always a great fit
customer_reviews.text: I rotate 2-3 pair of these through out the week as I'm walking most of the day. Worn them for years, and highly recommended. One caveat is that the laces are a smidge shorter than most.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Larsen

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of these classic Pumas
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these classic Pumas. They're made well and have held up over the months, however they are definitely narrower than I'd prefer around the toes. After a few weeks they broke in and fit a little better though.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Stooooopid spicy coloway
customer_reviews.text: Another classic puma basket thus colorway is 🔥 dress it up dress this down if you like kicks and puma baskets press add to cart
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great leather sneakers on a budget. Easy to clean and they break in well.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Universal shoes
customer_reviews.text: Like it, universal shoes, but it 1 size bigger. Always wear 10.5 US = 28.5cm, but in this model insole is 29cm. Thats why I bought 10 for 28.5cm
customer_reviews.author: Andrey Chernov

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size for me, had to return
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were uncomfortably narrow. I had to return them. They seemed to be well made, but that doesn't matter if the shoe doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Style
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Just went on a three week trip and wore no shoes but these. So comfortable I forgot they were on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Foxone

customer_reviews.title: Nice color combo
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff, but somewhat elegant for a tennis shoe, good for dressing up but still casual
customer_reviews.author: Israel Amaro

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Thin in materials. Needs some inserts and fat laces
customer_reviews.author: Adam Omeljaniuk

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The toe lacks depth and tends to push down on the toenail even though the length is OK.
customer_reviews.author: rlgodden

customer_reviews.title: i wear 10. 5 wide (US) the size 11(US) ...
customer_reviews.text: i wear 10.5 wide (US) the size 11(US) fits me.
customer_reviews.author: Armando M.

customer_reviews.title: Yep
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and feel. Love the color. Will be buying more Pumas
customer_reviews.author: BERO

customer_reviews.title: nice looking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe, a little tight in the toe box. Maybe go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: I. Joseph Marguliath

customer_reviews.title: Cool Puma Sneaks!
customer_reviews.text: These Puma shoes are just cool! The color is just like it looks in the pics and looks great with jeans or shorts. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bobik

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe size 12 fits like a size 12 love ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe size 12 fits like a size 12 love them .The Arabian spice is darker than the picture but nice
customer_reviews.author: Darron Fludd

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: i didn't find them very comfortable. very narrow fit. i returned them
customer_reviews.author: Alistair Zebulon

customer_reviews.title: Hot shoe!
customer_reviews.text: A beauty in every sense of the word! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: A  Collins

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe, that fits well and feels comfortable. Shame about the quality though. Wore it once and these ugly wrinkles appeared!
customer_reviews.author: Rathin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Slightly larger than my other pumas. Great service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Sebastien Manus

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This colour is awesome and the shoes are great quality, nice!
customer_reviews.author: Tane Luckens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I only purchase Puma sneakers because of the comfort, fit, and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cancelino

customer_reviews.title: Retro inspired baller sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They look great and feel great. Got compliments the first day I wore them out. I'm not a sneaker whore or anything but I do like quality products and these shoes are very good indeed.
customer_reviews.author: OmegaMan2006

customer_reviews.title: Great classic kicks~
customer_reviews.text: Big Puma fan here. I got the 6.5 men's for myself. They're somewhat narrow for men's shoe sizes but works fine for women of course. I stuck thick insoles which made the fit better and softer. Looks even better when you put leather shoe polish on them!
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: so far she seems to like them: )
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift; so far she seems to like them :)
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it should be very comfortable. I'm very satisfied with this
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very affordable. Although I didn't go out yet with these shoes, I'm sure it should be very comfortable. I'm very satisfied with this.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Puma really makes attractive shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Love 'em. I think the narrowness will work itself out.
customer_reviews.author: Loopy the HoundDog

customer_reviews.title: Great show so returned and reordered proper size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size to small by mistake. Great show so returned and reordered proper size.
customer_reviews.author: Uwem Obot

customer_reviews.title: unfortunately it was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Wearing it hurts my foots .. unfortunately it was a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Bassam Haddad

product_meta.title: PUMA Mens Basket Classic CITI-M Basket Classic Citi
product_meta.description: Originate from the puma archive back in 1971, this was the leather answer to the suede. It's singular but yet clean and simple design propelled this shoe into the sneaker hall of fame. This season sees the basket citi adopt a more streetwise and urban look with a material update
feature_bullets: Classic street sneaker with waxed and smooth leather finishes and patterned collar lining
